definition: male/Baron, lowest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/CL:個|个[ge4]
lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic
to catch a couple in the act (adultery, illicit sexual relations)
variant of 搭訕|搭讪[da1 shan4]
smooth talker/fast talker/slick and sociable person/person in the news
"Pregnancy-oriented Economy", new market conditions brought about by a predicted baby boom in China
double income family who have pets rather than children (see also 丁克[ding1 ke4])
to intersperse comic dialogue (as they do in operas)

pinyin: You2 li4 ya4 · Ji4 mo4 shen1 ke1

definition: singles seeking marriage partners/in-laws and friends
to strangle or throttle to death
